code: import _objectSpread from"/home/soklin/Documents/Project/MIS/Dev-MIS/front-end/mis/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{LOGIN_SUCCESS,LOGIN_ERROR,LOGIN_LOADING,RESET_PASSWORD}from"../actions/LoginActions";var initialState={success:false,loading:false,error:{username:null,password:null}};var LoginReducer=function LoginReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOGIN_LOADING:{return _objectSpread({},state,{loading:true});}case LOGIN_SUCCESS:{return _objectSpread({},state,{success:true,loading:false});}case RESET_PASSWORD:{return _objectSpread({},state,{success:true,loading:false});}case LOGIN_ERROR:{return{success:false,loading:false,error:action.data};}default:{return state;}}};export default LoginReducer;
